text: Some Girls is a 1988 coming of age romantic comedy drama movie directed by Michael Hoffman and stars Patrick Dempsey, Jennifer Connelly, Sheila Kelley. It was distributed by United Artists. Some Girls was released in the United States on September 9, 1988. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1988 comedy- drama movies Category:1988 romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Hoffman
title: Some Girls (movie)
